text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Suga was born in Otaru on September 10, 1998. He joined J2 League club Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo from their youth team in 2016. Consadole won the champions in 2016 and was promoted to J1 League. He played many matches as left side midfielder from 2017. In May 2019, Suga was selected the Japan national team for 2019 Copa América, but he did not play in the match. In December, he was selected the Japan for 2019 E-1 Football Championship.
